Description.Text:
Property Location
You'll be centrally located in Barton with a stay at Hotel Realm, minutes from Manuka Oval and Parliament House. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of National Archives of Australia and Kingston Shopping Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 163 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring iPod docking stations and minibars. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. Additional amenities at this Art Deco hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and a computer station. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Manuka Oval - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
National Archives of Australia - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Kingston Shopping Centre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Parliament House - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Manuka Shopping Centre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Old Parliament House - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Museum of Australian Democracy - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
National Portrait Gallery - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
National Gallery of Australia - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Embassy of America - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
British High Commission - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
High Court of Australia - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Embassy of China - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Questacon - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Embassy of France - 1.6 km / 1 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Realm is Canberra, ACT (CBR-Canberra Intl.) - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
